tasks.build: deno task build-deno-wasm && deno task build-websafe-wasm && deno fmt
tasks.build-deno-wasm: cargo build  --manifest-path ./rust/Cargo.toml --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release && mkdir -p wasm && wasm-bindgen ./rust/target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/deno.wasm --out-dir ./wasm/ --out-name wasm --target deno --typescript
tasks.build-websafe-wasm: cargo build --manifest-path ./rust/Cargo.toml --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release && mkdir -p wasm/websafe && wasm-bindgen ./rust/target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/websafe.wasm --out-dir ./wasm/websafe --out-name wasm --target web --typescript
